13
• About this report and feedback  
 
We’re pleased to share with you information on our environmental, social and economic performance. This 2012 Corporate Responsibility Report reflects the operations of AMR 
Corporation, the parent company of American Airlines and its regional affiliate, American Eagle Airlines, for the 2012 calendar year. As in previous years, we have used the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) G3 Guidelines and continue to report at the GRI B Application Level.
